sentences.sContent: His voice was harsh as he enunciated each word carefully.
sentences.sCn: 他用刺耳的声音小心地一字一句地念着。

sentences.sContent: She enunciates very slowly and carefully.

remMethod.val: e(出) + nunci(=nounce报告， 说) + ate → 说出来 → 发音， 表达

trans.tranOther: When you enunciate a word or part of a word, you pronounce it clearly
